name: Dark Realm: Queen of Flames - A Mystical Hidden Object Adventure (Full)
name_original: Dark Realm: Queen of Flames - A Mystical Hidden Object Adventure (Full)
description:
Unlock the complete adventure with a single purchase! No in-app purchases!

Without warning, a group of mysterious figures arrives and reduces your village to flames and rubble. What do they want… and who is controlling them?

• DISCOVER A MYSTICAL KINGDOM FULL OF ADVENTURE
You are a blacksmith’s daughter whose town is under attack by mysterious hooded creatures. After your father is taken captive, it’s up to you to go on a journey to save him!

• CLAIM YOUR RIGHTFUL PLACE
On your quest you will uncover secrets, solve challenging puzzles, and encounter enigmatic characters with unclear motives. The fate of the whole kingdom is at stake in this story of adventure, courage, and fire.

• SPARK YOUR INNER FIRE TO DEFEAT A DARK THREAT
Flee the village and seek help from the Queen. But you’ll have to lie low to avoid becoming another minion of the flame banshees! Use special abilities and power-ups to make your way through a mystical world.

• SAVE NORTHPEARL FROM A DEADLY NEW THREAT IN THE BONUS GAME!
Search for collectible flames hidden throughout your adventure! Then unlock even more puzzles and mini-games as well as beautiful wallpapers, and an art gallery!
